content:
This Omni-Gallery is
the most magnificent and beautiful building
I've ever seen on the Astralink!

Seeing the Omni-Gallery completed,
I finally understand why they call it "Omni" â€”
It really lives up to its name!

Nowadays when I go for walks,
I find myself unconsciously heading towards the Omni-Gallery.
The architectural design is just so beautiful!
